    • Method Detail

      • tintedImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage tintedImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage src,
                                       java.awt.Color color,
                                       float alpha)
        Returns a image that is a copy of the src image overlaid with a tint mask.
        Parameters:
        src - the image to be tinted
        color - the color of the tint to be applied
        alpha - the intensity of the tint from with 0.0 having no effect and 1.0 being a full mask
        Returns:
        the buffered image

                                        float alpha)
        Generate mask.
        Parameters:
        imgSource - the img source
        color - the color of the tint to be applied
        alpha - the intensity of the tint
        Returns:
        the buffered image
